settings.text: vidlogix wants you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not satisfied for any reason, our return policy allows you to send back returns-eligible merchandise within 30 days of the date you received the package for a refund of the purchase price, minus the shipping & handling and return label fee.

settings.title: Return shipping is on PayPal when you checkout with PayPal.
settings.text: If you aren’t happy with your order, PayPal will provide a free return shipping label or refund the cost of sending it back on eligible purchases.

settings.title: Make a return
settings.text:
A Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA) number is required for all returns. RMA numbers are valid for ten (10) days. Unauthorized returns will be returned to the sender or recycled.

Request a RMA online.

Pack your items carefully since they are still your items until we have verified their functionality and physical condition. Please DO NOT treat the item box as the shipping box.

Ensure that there are no other tracking labels attached to your package. If you are shipping a non-hazardous item, completely remove or cover any hazardous materials markings.

Affix the mailing label squarely onto the address side of the parcel, covering up any previous delivery address and barcode without overlapping any adjacent side.

Take this package to a USPS location (mailbox, post office, etc.). To find your closest USPS location, visit the USPS Locator or go to www.usps.com.

settings.title: Free PayPal returns
settings.text:
You must activate Return shipping on us* in your PayPal account BEFORE purchasing from vidlogix.com using your PayPal account.

To claim a refund for your return, please follow the below steps:

Follow the returns procedure, making sure to retain proof of postage from your local postal service. Log into your PayPal account once you have received your vidlogix refund. In your PayPal account, select the transaction, and click the ‘Request return shipping refund’ link. Fill out a refund request providing evidence of your posting receipts to the PayPal return shipping on us service. Make sure you complete the claim form within 30 days of making your purchase. Remember to attach / upload your proof of postage. Submit your claim to PayPal.

If your claim is approved by PayPal, they will send a refund of up to $30 to your PayPal account within 10 business days.

*For PayPal purchases only. PayPal terms & conditions apply.

settings.title: Where is my refund?
settings.text:
Know that returns and credits can take up to ten (10) business days from the time the merchant accepts them to the time they post to your account—and show up in your balance.

In most cases, once a refund has been submitted, the issuing bank will post it to your account within 3-5 business days when issued to a credit card. Refunds issued to a bank account or pin-less debit typically take 10 business days to reflect on the account balance. Refunds to a PayPal account will show up later the same day. This time frame may vary from one financial institution to another.

If you don't see the refund posted to your account, please contact your issuing bank for further assistance. Your bank can clarify how long it'll take them to post the refund. If your bank has trouble locating the completed refund, please contact our billing specialists so they can investigate why this may be happening.

settings.title: Important details
settings.text:
If the product is returned unopened, unused, undamaged, and in the original packaging, we will offer a refund of the purchase price, minus the shipping & handling and return label fee, which refund will be made by crediting the account used to make the original purchase. The refund amount indicated is an estimate based on the full invoice price; however, the actual amount refunded may be adjusted to account for any discounts, promotions, sales tax differences, deductions, credits and/or restocking fees pertaining to your order. 

Refundable – Factory sealed, shrink-wrapped, unopened, unused, undamaged items in the original packaging are refundable within 30 days of delivery. Damaged/defective items will be replaced (subject to availability) upon inspection. Vidlogix does not issue advanced replacements. The fastest way to receive a replacement is to make a new order.

Non-refundable – Certain product categories are ineligible for return, including, but not limited to, consumables, kitchen appliances, personal protective equipment, recorders, software, clearance, final sale, and special order items. Damaged/defective items should be sent to the manufacturer for service. Vidlogix is not liable if the manufacturer fails to perform warranty service.

Return shipping fees – We do not pay for returns unless the item is damaged, defective or incorrect. If you have received a damaged, defective or incorrect item please contact us and we will arrange the return for you. If you wish to return your item for another reason, e.g. 'the item is unsuitable' then please arrange postage yourself. Vidlogix can issue one (1) return shipping label per order for a flat-fee of $10. Return shipping fees are deducted from your refund.

Refused delivery – We're unable to update or cancel an order once it ships. Return shipping fees are deducted from your refund. Contact us to arrange a return.
